mapper.sql: select graph_id as graphId, last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, last_modify_user as lastModifyUser, description as description, no as no, to_images as toImages, page as page, images_gson as imagesGson from monitor_graph_merger
mapper.select: select graph_id as graphId, page as page from monitor_graph_merger where 1=1
mapper.insert: insert into monitor_graph_merger( graph_id, last_modify_time, last_modify_user, description, no, to_images, page, images_gson ) values( #{graphId}, #{lastModifyTime}, #{lastModifyUser}, #{description}, #{no}, #{toImages}, #{page}, #{imagesGson} )
mapper.update: update monitor_graph_merger set graph_id=#{graphId}, last_modify_time=#{lastModifyTime}, last_modify_user=#{lastModifyUser}, description=#{description}, no=#{no}, to_images=#{toImages}, page=#{page}, images_gson=#{imagesGson} where graph_id=#{graphId}
